text: Mary Beth Peil (born 25 June 1940 in Davenport, Iowa) is an American actress and singer. She acts on stage and in movies. She played Alma in the 1971 play Summer and Smoke. She also performed in many other plays. Her last name is pronounced "peel". Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Davenport, Iowa Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Iowa
title: Mary Beth Peil
